skill.name: frontend-design
skill.description: Create distinctive, production-grade frontend interfaces with high design quality. Use this skill when the user asks to build web components, pages, or applications. Generates creative, polished code that avoids generic AI aesthetics.
skill.summary: Create distinctive, production-grade frontend interfaces with high design quality. Use this skill wh...

security_audit.summary: Official source with a small, static instruction file. No executable code or external calls were found. No security issues identified.

content.value_statement: Frontend work often looks generic and forgettable when rushed. This skill guides you to build distinctive interfaces with a clear aesthetic direction.
actual_capabilities: Define a bold aesthetic direction before implementation
Guide typography pairing and font selection away from generic defaults
Recommend cohesive color systems with CSS variables
Plan motion and reveal sequences for impactful interactions
Shape layouts with asymmetry, overlap, and creative spatial composition
limitations: Does not provide licensed fonts or graphic assets
Does not execute code or validate runtime behavior
Requires user requirements and context to tailor results
Does not guarantee accessibility or performance compliance

use_cases.title: Launch page concept
use_cases.description: Create a memorable landing page style direction with layout, typography, and motion guidance.

use_cases.title: Brand-first demo UI
use_cases.description: Shape a distinctive interface for investor demos without relying on generic UI templates.

use_cases.title: High-fidelity component
use_cases.description: Specify a unique visual direction for a complex component before coding.

prompt_templates.title: Simple hero section
prompt_templates.prompt: Design a hero section for a creative studio. Provide typography, colors, layout, and a brief motion plan.

prompt_templates.title: Product page layout
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a full product page concept with a bold visual theme, sections list, and key styling rules.

prompt_templates.title: App dashboard theme
prompt_templates.prompt: Define an aesthetic direction for a data dashboard, including typography pairs, color variables, and layout rules.

prompt_templates.title: Experimental interface
prompt_templates.prompt: Design a maximalist interface for a music platform with dramatic motion ideas and layered backgrounds.

output_examples.input: Create a refined, editorial landing page for a boutique hotel.
output: - A serif display font paired with a clean humanist sans for body text
- Warm neutral palette with a single deep teal accent for CTAs
- Asymmetric grid with overlapping image cards and generous margins
- Slow, staggered reveal on load with subtle parallax on hero imagery

best_practices: Provide clear audience, purpose, and constraints before requesting a design
Ask for a specific aesthetic direction to avoid generic output
Request CSS variables and motion timing notes for implementation
anti_patterns: Requesting a generic modern UI without context
Forcing default system fonts and purple gradients
Mixing conflicting aesthetics in one brief

faq.question: Is it compatible with my framework?
faq.answer: Yes, it can guide designs for HTML, React, Vue, and similar frontend stacks.

faq.question: What are its limits?
faq.answer: It does not run code, fetch assets, or guarantee accessibility compliance.

faq.question: Can it integrate with my design system?
faq.answer: Yes, provide your tokens and constraints to align outputs with your system.

faq.question: Is my data safe?
faq.answer: It works from your prompt only and does not access external data sources.

faq.question: What if the output feels off?
faq.answer: Provide clearer tone, audience, and constraints, then request a revised direction.

faq.question: How does it compare to generic UI generators?
faq.answer: It prioritizes distinctive aesthetics and avoids common template driven layouts.
